skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice summit guide
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is the companion skill to VOICE Summit, the world's largest Voice First gathering, taking place in Newark, New Jersey July 22-26, 2019. 

Here are some things you can ask the skill: "What topics will be covered?" "Where can I stay?" "How do I get there?" or "How do I buy tickets?"

If you want to listen to what participants have to say, just say, "Listen to voicebits."

If you yourself want to post something that will be played in the skill, just download the Castlingo mobile app, record an audio, and post it to the Voice Summit Guide channel.

Find out more about the summit by going to www.voicesummit.ai or by following them on twitter via @VOICESummitAI

This skill was built using Buildlingo, a Witlingo product. If you would like your very own Buildlingo skill, please visit http://www.witlingo.com/buildlingo/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
